title: Refactor parameter definition of DistSQL for feature encrypt
body:
Fixes #20030.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Add parser test cases in module `shardingsphere-encrypt-distsql`
- Refactor parameter definition of DistSQL encrypt.

1.  CREATE ENCRYPT RULE

* Before

```
CREATE ENCRYPT RULE t_encrypt (COLUMNS(
(NAME=user_id,PLAIN=user_plain,CIPHER=user_cipher,TYPE(NAME=AES,PROPERTIES('aes-key-value'='123456abc'))),
(NAME=order_id, CIPHER =order_cipher,TYPE(NAME=MD5))),
QUERY_WITH_CIPHER_COLUMN=true);
```

* after

```
CREATE ENCRYPT RULE t_encrypt (COLUMNS(
(NAME=user_id,PLAIN=user_plain,CIPHER=user_cipher,TYPE(NAME='AES',PROPERTIES('aes-key-value'='123456abc'))),
(NAME=order_id, CIPHER =order_cipher,TYPE(NAME='MD5'))),
QUERY_WITH_CIPHER_COLUMN=true);
```

2.  ALTER ENCRYPT RULE

* Before

```
ALTER ENCRYPT RULE t_encrypt (COLUMNS(
(NAME=user_id,PLAIN=user_plain,CIPHER=user_cipher,TYPE(NAME=AES,PROPERTIES('aes-key-value'='123456abc'))),
(NAME=order_id,CIPHER=order_cipher,TYPE(NAME=MD5))),
QUERY_WITH_CIPHER_COLUMN=TRUE);
```

* after

```
ALTER ENCRYPT RULE t_encrypt (COLUMNS(
(NAME=user_id,PLAIN=user_plain,CIPHER=user_cipher,TYPE(NAME='AES',PROPERTIES('aes-key-value'='123456abc'))),
(NAME=order_id,CIPHER=order_cipher,TYPE(NAME='MD5'))),
QUERY_WITH_CIPHER_COLUMN=TRUE);
```

title: Split DistSQLResultSet to DatabaseDistSQLResultSet and GlobalRuleDistSQLResultSet.
body: In the later stage, the syntax of Global Rule will be migrated to specific modules. In order to ensure that the ResultSet can be returned normally after the migration, the `DistSQLResultSet` will be split to `DatabaseDistSQLResultSet` and `GlobalRuleDistSQLResultSet`. The Global Rule syntax will use `GlobalRuleDistSQLResultSet`.
